form.label: Code42 Removable Media
form.description: This dashboard is used to identify the data leaving a company via the removable media vector.

search.query: | inputlookup user_lookup | dedup username sortby -modificationDate | table username, userUid

chart.title: Files Created by Device Count Last 7 Days

search.query: index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"=create | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | table readableTimestamp,deviceGuid,name,file.fileEventType,file.fileName,file.md5,file.length,file.lastModified | chart count over name

index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"=create | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | timechart count as "Count of Files Created" | join [search index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent earliest=-1mon "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"=create | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | eventstats count as thirty_day_count | eval AVG = thirty_day_count/30 | timechart span=2mon avg(AVG) as "MONTH AVERAGE"]

index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"=create | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | rename file.length as fileSize | timechart eval(sum(fileSize)/(1024)/(1024)) as "Megabytes" | join [search index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent earliest=-1mon "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"=create | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | rename file.length as fileSize | eventstats sum(fileSize) as thirty_day_total | eval AVG = thirty_day_total/30/1024/1024 | timechart span=2mon avg(AVG) as "MONTH AVERAGE"]

chart.title: Files Created by File Type Top 10

search.query: index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent eventType=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY file.fileEventType=create file.fileName="*.*" file.fileName!="*cprestore*" file.fileName!="*testWrite*" | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | table file.fileName | rex field=file.fileName "(?<fileType>[^.]+)$" | chart count by fileType | sort count desc limit=10

chart.title: Data Created by File Types Top 10

search.query: index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent eventType=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY file.fileEventType=create file.fileName="*.*" | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | rename file.length as length | eval "File Size" = round(length / 1024) | table file.fileName,"File Size" | rex field=file.fileName "(?<fileType>[^.]+)$" | chart sum("File Size") by fileType | sort sum("File Size") desc limit=10

table.title: File Create and Modify Events Last 24 Hours

search.query: index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"!=scan file.md5!=ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | lookup user_lookup userUid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | rename file.lastModified as file_lastModified | eval file_lastModified=file_lastModified / 1000 | rename detectionDevice.busType as "Media Type",detectionDevice.serialNumber as "Serial Number",name as "Device Name",username as Username,orgName as "C42 Org Name",file.fileEventType as "File Event Type",file.fileName as Filename,file.md5 as "File MD5Hash",file.length as "Filesize in Bytes",file_lastModified as "File Last Modified" | table _time,"Media Type","Serial Number","Device Name",Username,"C42 Org Name","File Event Type",Filename,"File MD5Hash","Filesize in Bytes","File Last Modified" | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime("File Last Modified") | sort _time desc

table.title: File Create and Modify Events Last 7 Days

search.query: index=code42 sourcetype=c42securityevent "eventType"=DEVICE_FILE_ACTIVITY "file.fileEventType"!=scan file.md5!=ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff | lookup computer_lookup guid as deviceGuid | lookup user_lookup userUid | search userUid=$useruid_tok$ | rename file.lastModified as file_lastModified | eval file_lastModified=file_lastModified / 1000 | rename detectionDevice.busType as "Media Type",detectionDevice.serialNumber as "Serial Number", name as "Device Name",username as Username,orgName as "C42 Org Name",file.fileEventType as "File Event Type",file.fileName as Filename,file.md5 as "File MD5Hash",file.length as "Filesize in Bytes",file_lastModified as "File Last Modified" | table _time,"Media Type","Serial Number","Device Name",Username,"C42 Org Name","File Event Type",Filename,"File MD5Hash","Filesize in Bytes","File Last Modified" | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime("File Last Modified") | sort _time desc
